string.value: You can now infiltrate the alien mothership!\r\nGet a new OSSS mission from #b#p9250146##k at the mothership crash site.

Enter the Cube in the air through the mothership. 
Defeat all the aliens inside and return to #b#p9250146##k to get a medal.

You can enter the mothership up to 3 times a day, but you can only get a medal for it once a day.
Return tomorrow to infiltrate the mothership again.\r\nDon't forget that the future of Maple World is in your hands.
This mission may be much more difficult than the ones you've done so far. Please take that into consideration before accepting.
You are very brave. I will issue you OSSS Mission 5.

As I've already mentioned, that mothership is designed so you can teleport to other cubes once inside. That means we have access to all the alien ships still in the sky. We can take this opportunity to launch an attack.
Please put on the #bVisitor Suit#k and enter the mothership. Defeat all the enemies inside.\r\nOnce inside, don't take off that suit. A foreign energy will detect it and attack you if you do.

When you complete the mission, the OSSS will issue you a medal.

Please remember that #bonly 1 medal will be issued to you each day#k for entering the mothership.
However, you can enter the ship up to #b3 times a day#k.
Doctor Bing and I will be in touch with you via radio.
I am disappointed, but I understand.
You haven't ventured into the mothership yet.
